clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Two Electroencephalograms (EEG) Monitors in Patients Undergoing General Intravenous Anesthesia
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of the Depth of Anesthesia During Intravenous Anesthesia: Comparison of the Bispectral Index Monitor and the qCON Monitor.

brief_summary.textblock: Quantium Medical Company has an ElectroEncephalograph-based (EEG-based) algorithm with two outputs: qCON for unconsciousness and qNOX for anti-nociception. qCON, is designed to provide information about the depth of the hypnotic state, similar to that provided by the BISâ„¢.

primary_outcome.measure: qCON monitoring during maintenance of anesthesia
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of qCON values during maintenance of anesthesia

primary_outcome.measure: BIS monitoring during maintenance of anesthesia
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of BIS values during maintenance of anesthesia

secondary_outcome.measure: qCON monitoring during induction of anesthesia

secondary_outcome.measure: BIS monitoring during induction of anesthesia
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of BIS values during induction of anesthesia

secondary_outcome.measure: qCON monitoring during recovery of anesthesia
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of qCON values during recovery of anesthesia

secondary_outcome.measure: BIS monitoring during recovery of anesthesia
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of BIS values during recovery of anesthesia

secondary_outcome.measure: Burst Suppression ratio retrieved by qCON monitoring
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of Burst Suppression ratio values during anesthesia

secondary_outcome.measure: Burst Suppression ratio retrieved by BIS monitoring
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of Burst Suppression ratio values during anesthesia
Measurement of qNOX values during anesthesia

secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of qCON values during anesthesia

Questionnaire for assessment of memorising of surgery by the patient

arm_group.description: Simultaneous measurement of BIS and qCON

intervention.description: supervision by qCON monitor of the depth of anesthesia

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients above 18 years,
- Patients affiliated to a national insurance scheme or benefiting from such a program,
- Patients having given their written consent,
- Patients that must benefit from a general anesthesia by intravenous drugs (propofol and remifentanil),
- For the patients taken care in ambulatory surgery, having a telephone and agreeing to communicate their phone number.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or breast-feeding Women,
- Patients having a limit of use of the Bispectral Index (BIS) or qCON monitors,
- Patients having a contraindication to Propofol and/or to Remifentanil.
